title: "You'll Leave Through Chimney": Nazi Death Camp Inmates In France Were Told
content: When American soldiers liberated the only Nazi concentration camp in France almost exactly 80 years ago, they found it utterly deserted.
summary: When American soldiers liberated the only Nazi concentration camp in France almost exactly 80 years ago, they found it utterly deserted.

title: Israel-Hezbollah Clashes Continue Amid Truce Talks
content: Israel and Lebanon's Hezbollah traded deadly blows on Thursday as their war raged on despite signs of progress in US ceasefire efforts, with airstrikes pounding Beirut's southern suburbs and rockets flying into northern Israel.
summary: Israel and Lebanon's Hezbollah traded deadly blows on Thursday as their war raged on despite signs of progress in US ceasefire efforts, with airstrikes pounding Beirut's southern suburbs and rockets flying into northern Israel.

title: Israeli PM Netanyahu Faces Arrest For War Crimes After World Court Ruling
content: An arrest warrant has been issued today against Israeli Prime Minister Benjamin Netanyahu and his Defence Minister Yoav Gallant by the International Criminal Court.
summary: An arrest warrant has been issued today against Israeli Prime Minister Benjamin Netanyahu and his Defence Minister Yoav Gallant by the International Criminal Court.

title: World Court Issues Arrest Warrant Against Hamas Chief, Israel PM Netanyahu
content: The International Criminal Court in The Hague said on Thursday that it had issued warrants for the arrest of Hamas leader Mohammed Diab Ibrahim Al-Masri and Israel's President Benjamin Netanyahu and Yoav Gallant.
summary: The International Criminal Court in The Hague said on Thursday that it had issued warrants for the arrest of Hamas leader Mohammed Diab Ibrahim Al-Masri and Israel's President Benjamin Netanyahu and Yoav Gallant.

title: Russia's Firing Of ICBM On Ukraine Is Weapon's 1st Combat Use In History
content: Russia reportedly launched an inter-continental ballistic missile (ICBM) on Ukraine, marking the first combat use of the weapon since its inception.
summary: Russia reportedly launched an inter-continental ballistic missile (ICBM) on Ukraine, marking the first combat use of the weapon since its inception.

title: "Shocked By Abduction Of Uganda Opposition Leader": UN Human Rights Chief
content: The UN rights chief on Thursday urged the Ugandan government to release opposition politician Kizza Besigye after his apparent kidnapping in Kenya, demanding an investigation into "the circumstances of his abduction".
summary: The UN rights chief on Thursday urged the Ugandan government to release opposition politician Kizza Besigye after his apparent kidnapping in Kenya, demanding an investigation into "the circumstances of his abduction".

title: Tallest And Shortest Women Meet To Celebrate Guinness World Records Day
content: The worlds tallest woman, Rumeysa Geligo from Turkey, and shortest woman, Jyoti Amge from India, met in London to celebrate Guinness World Records Day 2024.
summary: The worlds tallest woman, Rumeysa Geligo from Turkey, and shortest woman, Jyoti Amge from India, met in London to celebrate Guinness World Records Day 2024.

title: China Man Jailed For Abandoning Terminal-Cancer Wife 2 Months After Wedding
content: Feng initially cared for her but soon used out-of-town work commitments as a pretext to desert her.

title: India, Australia Sign Deal For Air-To-Air Refuelling Of Military Aircraft
content: Australia and India have signed an arrangement to enable the Royal Australian Air Force (RAAF) and India's armed forces to conduct air-to-air refuelling. This will greatly enhance interoperability between the air forces of the two friendly nations.
summary: Australia and India have signed an arrangement to enable the Royal Australian Air Force (RAAF) and India's armed forces to conduct air-to-air refuelling. This will greatly enhance interoperability between the air forces of the two friendly nations.

title: You Will Soon Be Able To Reset Your Instagram Algorithm. Here's How
content: While the algorithm reset is only in a testing phase now, Instagram plans to roll it out globally.

title: Ellen DeGeneres, Partner Portia de Rossi Leave US After Trump's Win: Report
content: After Trump's win, Ellen and Portia put their Montecito mansion up for sale and plan to list another California property.

title: Russia Launches ICBM At Ukraine In Stern Message To Kyiv, Western Allies
content: Russia has fired an Inter-Continental Ballistic Missile or ICBM at Ukraine a day after Vladimir Putin changed Moscow's nuclear doctrine.

title: Chilling History Of Squirrel Cage Jail, Where Anmol Bishnoi Is Lodged

title: Oldest Known Human Has Fascinating Secrets Even 50 Years After Discovery
content: Lucy was often described as "the grandmother of humanity", but more recent discoveries suggest she may have been more like an aunt or a cousin, experts say.

title: "Jeff Bezos Was Telling Everyone...": Elon Musk's Claim About Amazon CEO
content: X boss Elon Musk, who is set to take over as co-chair of the proposed Department of Government Efficiency (DOGE) in the second Donald Trump administration, has claimed that Amazon head Jeff Bezos had advised people to sell Tesla and SpaceX stocks

title: AI Usage Quickly Broadens From IT To HR And Marketing, Survey Shows
content: About 72% of decision makers reported that generative AI is used at least once a week, up from 37% in 2023, the first year of the survey.

title: C-A-R-I-C-O-M Spells Out 7 Key Pillars Of India-Caribbean Cooperation: PM Modi
content: Leading the India-Caricom summit as the co-chair, Prime Minister Narendra Modi outlined a seven-pillar programme of action playing on the acronym C-A-R-I-C-O-M.

title: Four Tourists Die After Suspected Laos Methanol Poisoning
content: Four foreign tourists have died after a suspected mass methanol poisoning from drinking tainted alcohol at a backpacker hotspot in Laos, Western government officials and media said Thursday.
summary: Four foreign tourists have died after a suspected mass methanol poisoning from drinking tainted alcohol at a backpacker hotspot in Laos, Western government officials and media said Thursday.

title: K-Drama For Mental Health? Binge On, One Expert Says
content: If you've ever binge-watched an entire season of a K-drama like "Squid Game" or "Crash Landing On You", one Korean-American expert has good news: it's likely improved your mental health.
summary: If you've ever binge-watched an entire season of a K-drama like "Squid Game" or "Crash Landing On You", one Korean-American expert has good news: it's likely improved your mental health.
